website_summaries.verdict: A fun and affordable four-wheeler for kids ages 3 to 8.
pros: Pedal moves the vehicle forward and backward
Little vibration thanks to spring suspension system
Console has preset songs and stories
cons: Some buyers report technical problems that are difficult to troubleshoot

customer_reviews.title: Battery is different from other ride on car. But my kids love ride on this car.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it, riding it every where. At first, I do spend a long time try to figure out how to install. The battery system is different from other ride on car. For example, other ride on car you have to take out battery and charge it. But this car is easier, you can plug into the car, no additional battery. You can drive this car on road and even on grass too. My kids love it and have fun time on it.
customer_reviews.author: Stay

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest product to return, when wired wrong. No customer wants to go through hoops if they receive an item especially online that does not work properly when all the want to do is return the item and get their money back. The fast and slow setting was the same speed and the item buttons for other settings were labeled wrong. I wouldnt buy this item again. I also wouldn't recommend anyone else buy either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute worst product ever!!! Do not waste your money!!! It goes literally like 2 mph..... my 5 year old is so disappointed that he cried his eyes out because it hardly would even go!!! Now I have to waste more money than it’s worth if I want to return it and ship it back!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good toy for my 2 year old.
customer_reviews.text: This it shipped quickly. It goes faster than I expected. My husband and I wondered if it would go around our yard well since we have lots of hills. It has NO problem zooming around our yard. The turn radius on this toy is almost non existent. Which was why I took a star away. Overall very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie&Dana

customer_reviews.title: Very good battery life, better than two hours of battery life with excellent traction off road.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for price! Easily ensembles with detailed instructions. Very good battery life, better than two hours of battery life with excellent traction in grass and dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: this is not large enough for a 3 o 8 yr old child--it is to small for my 6 yr old grandson
customer_reviews.text: it is great for a smaller child but definitely not up to 8 yrs old
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: A garage product and I can’t get any help returning it
customer_reviews.text: Used one time and broke I’m trying to return it for a refund and the manufacturer wants me to pay the shipping bill $87.00
customer_reviews.author: Jeff cassell

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assembly. Battery life is good, grandkids love it.
customer_reviews.author: todd blanton

customer_reviews.title: Kid likes it
customer_reviews.text: this 12v kids ride on quad is perfect for my 5 years old boy, he likes it so much. It took me 2 hours to assemble it because the instruction is kind of hard to understand. But it works well, my little one has so much fun with it. And it has many built in features like playing music, telling stories. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality
customer_reviews.text: It is a very very cheap quality the steering handle came off after 2 weeks. We were able to fix ourselves. But after a month the whole thing doesn’t work. Doesn’t charge doesn’t turn on NOTHING waste of money and disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Agata

product_meta.title: Uenjoy 12V Kids ATV 4 Wheeler Ride On Quad Battery Powered Electric ATV for Kids, 2 Speeds, Wheels Suspension, LED Lights, Music (Red&Black)
feature_bullets: 【Large Size】- Perfect gift for your kids age 3-8 yrs old. Multiple features on the console with preset songs & stories, battery gauge, adjustable volume; you are also able to connect your portable devices to play kids favorite music via USB port or MP3 port. Please watch the video on the listing for easy installation.

【Driving Mode】- Kids can control the car by the foot pedal to move it forward or backward, 2 speeds accessible (high-hare /low-tortoise), smooth & simple to ride. Key start with an awesome motor start up sound.

【Great Power】- Containing 2 powerful 12V motors for great speed, offers your kid a realistic driving experience, it works well on grass, concrete, blacktop and dirt terrains. Please let kids ride under the supervision of an adult.

【Premium Quality】- Equipped with spring suspension system to minimize the vibration and offers a more enjoyable ride for kids, there is a portable handle at the back to move the car if it’s running out of power.
【Specifications】- Product size : 39” L x 27” W x 26.8”H. Motors: 12 volt * 2. Battery: 12V/7AH rechargeable (included). Assembly tools required.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars110 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
